attributes.action: No cancer-patient should be refused life saving treatment due to budget restraints at their local NHS Trust
attributes.additional_details: Cancer patients should not be refused life saving treatments due to local NHS Trust budgets, the overseas aid budget should be used to supplement cancer treatment in the current fiscal year, any surplus that is left over in the overseas aid budget at the end of the fiscal year after paying for necessary life saving cancer treatments can then be used the following fiscal year for overseas aid, were it is needed. This petition is not against overseas aid, we need to help our families & friends and then supply other aid when & where  we can. Basically use the billions set a side for overseas aid,first on necessary Cancer treatments within the NHS and any surplus left over in the overseas aid budget can then be used as required in the next fiscal year.
